author: Brian Turner
method: Line the base of a metal medium-size chefs' ring with the sponge fingers cut to size. In a bowl, mix the Greek yoghurt with the mascarpone and honey. Lay this mixture on top of the sponge fingers and smooth with a palette knife or spoon. Using a blow torch to warm the sides, release the cheesecake from the mould. Serve.
